channel.title: How do I change shop prices?
channel.description:
I just added new items on my client/server. I added some of the items to shops. How do I change the items prices? The items I put in are automaticaly 214,000,000 +...
If you would like to help me, please reply ^_^. Thankyou..

item.title: How do I change shop prices?
item.dc:creator: @veki94 veki94
item.description:
@veki94 wrote:

Go to items.cfg and find the item you want to change.
The first number is the number for high alchemely.
The second is the shop buy price,and the third is the shop sell price.
Note.:I’m NOT SURE OF THIS.
~veki~

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change shop prices?
